code: import React from'react';import*as XLSX from'xlsx';import*as FileSaver from'file-saver';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Index=function Index(_ref){var csvData=_ref.csvData,fileName=_ref.fileName;var fileType='application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet;charset=UTF-8';var fileExtension='.xlsx';var exportToCSV=function exportToCSV(csvData,fileName){var ws=XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(csvData);var wb={Sheets:{'data':ws},SheetNames:['data']};var excelBuffer=XLSX.write(wb,{bookType:'xlsx',type:'array'});var data=new Blob([excelBuffer],{type:fileType});FileSaver.saveAs(data,fileName+fileExtension);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",style:styles.btn,className:"btn shadow-none",onClick:function onClick(e){return exportToCSV(csvData,fileName);},children:"Export to XLSX"})});};export default Index;var styles={btn:{minWidth:150,height:37,fontSize:14,fontWeight:600,color:'#7367f0',padding:'8px 0px',background:'#7267f02f',borderRadius:25}};
